title: Non-CO2 greenhouse gas separation using advanced porous materials
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2056-2098
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00285C, Review Article
Yan-Long Zhao, Xin Zhang, Mu-Zi Li, Jian-Rong Li
Non-CO2 greenhouse gas mitigation and recovery with advanced porous materials (MOFs, COFs, HOFs, POPs, etc.) would significantly contribute to achieving carbon neutrality and gain economic benefits concurrently.
